item.title: CV

item.title: Publications
item.description: Preprint 3 Mekena Metcalf, Chen-Yen Lai, Massimiliano Di Ventra and Chih-Chun Chien, “Hysteresis-like behavior of current fluctuations in closed and open lattice systems” In preparation. 2 Chen-Yen Lai, S. A. Trugman and Jian-Xin Zhu, “Optical absorption spectroscopy of plasmon exciton hybrid systems.” submitted to Nanoscale. 1 Chen-Yen Lai, Massimiliano Di Ventra, Michael Scheibner and Chih-Chun Chien, “Tunable current circulation in triangular quantum-dot metastructures.” arXiv:1802.02121 submitted to Phys. Rev. Lett.
